review:
Dr. Girish S V,     
experience with doctor was very amazing ,Dr. Is very friendly, I must say he has such calm nature and patience which really a person need for such responsible field. I went for my 2+ months older baby's vaccination which has been handled by doctor so nicely , and in the consultation we understood what to do and don't after the vaccinations . Dr. Gives sufficient time to let the patients understand every prospects of infant care.
I recommend the  Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Always a great experience to meet Dr Girish S V. 
His way of explaining things and treating baby is so soothing. His behavior is amazing as treating babies is not so easy thing. He is so calm and polite.

I am very happy for my baby that Dr. Girish is taking care of her since her birth.

Thanks and regards to Dr. Girish.

Keep up the good work.
God bless us all!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ** *** **** ****** *** *****with his treatment most of the time my kids will be alright within 1-2 days.i highly recommend all parents to show there kids to him for treatment.he listens to parents concerns very patiently.not at all behind money too.**** **** ************* ** *********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Do not recommend Girish SV to anyone. 

After booking an appointment, the doctor asked us to wait for few hours.
Then the doctor weighed the baby to check the weight ** ***** ** **** ** *** ***** ******** *** ******** ***** *** *** ********* ********. 

He asked us for a blood test and urine test for the baby. The nurse was very rude, poked the needle multiple times to the baby hand. ****** ****** *** *** ***** ******* *** ***** *** *** *******

Later when we found that the weighing scale was malfunctioned, he said see another doctor do not come here. **** ** *** ****************

Not recommended for any parents to consult this doctor or related nurse for . **** ***** **** **** ** *********** *** ******. Highly not satisfied.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: **** ****** **** ***** **** ** ******* **** ***** ** ***** If anyone asks for ear, eye or any other details he will direct to other doctors to check. *** ***** ****** ** **** *** ***** *** ***** ***** *** sometimes hurry and not explain in full details.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was the paediatric skin disorder for a one year below baby boy, the consultant flash a glance in the histopathological diagnosis report ( which we carried) and search about the ailment from the Google, brought out a bunch of printed papers and instructed us to read that also if anyone asks about the diseases (Xanthogranuloma) show them that we seem to be powerless. 3-4 minutes consultation and ₹ 800 fees along with ₹ 200 Registration charges

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very bad experirnce , as we shifted place our doc suggested him with great hope   but we waiting almost more than an hour & wen finally we met and started telling about problem for everything he smiled and and listened but finally said dat common in single word and over.. Even hospital people charged consultation as well registration fees but its really not worth

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** ** **** ************** Patiently listens to all matters. Explains every detail in health matters and provides comprehensive solutions. Has a different philosophy in guiding patients which really helps. One of the best doctors to consult for peadeatric matters.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Meet him for regular checkup & vaccination of my daughter. He said painless is not effective, thus take the vaccine with pain. Did not explain anything on the difference. Did not tell us how much pain the baby will undergo and for how long. My baby has been in pain since then for almost 16 hours now. I have spoken to lot of my friends with kids, and all of them have painless vaccine to their kids (as suggested by their doctor). Does not explain anything. Didn't even have time to resolve any queries we have. In fact, for the vaccine, the nurse had to remove babies clothes. Didn't even allow us to out them back on. Asked us to go out and do it. I DON'T RECOMMEND HIM AT ALL. Now I feel I should have changed the doctor long back.
